    • 构造器详细资料

      • Builder

        public Builder()

    • 方法详细资料

      • setShowWarningBeforeRecordVideo

        public MediaOptions.Builder setShowWarningBeforeRecordVideo(boolean showWarningBeforeRecord)
        Should set this option = true when support multi devices and OS version and set setMaxVideoDuration(int) options. (HTC devices usually can not limit video's duration when record, should show message warning before record)
        参数:
        showWarningBeforeRecord - Default is false.

      • setMediaListSelected

        public MediaOptions.Builder setMediaListSelected(java.util.List<MediaItem> mediaSelecteds)
        Set media list that already selected before.
        参数:
        mediaSelecteds - Media list selected before.

      • setCroppedFile

        public MediaOptions.Builder setCroppedFile(java.io.File croppedFile)
        参数:
        file - Use for save image that cropped. Default image cropped saved in file that created by Utils#createTempFile(android.content.Context)

        Note: file should not exist when pass to this method. Because if user cancels capture photo, this file will be temporary.

        croppedFile -

      • setFixAspectRatio

        public MediaOptions.Builder setFixAspectRatio(boolean fixAspectRatio)
        Sets whether the aspect ratio is fixed or not; true fixes the aspect ratio, while false allows it to be changed.
        参数:
        fixAspectRatio - Default is true.

      • setAspectX

        public MediaOptions.Builder setAspectX(int aspectX)
        参数:
        aspectX - Default is 1.

      • setAspectY

        public MediaOptions.Builder setAspectY(int aspectY)
        参数:
        aspectY - Default is 1.

      • setIsCropped

        public MediaOptions.Builder setIsCropped(boolean isCropped)
        Crop photo before return back photo. Not effective for video or set canSelectMultiPhoto(boolean) method's parameter =true.
        参数:
        isCropped -

      • canSelectMultiPhoto

        public MediaOptions.Builder canSelectMultiPhoto(boolean canSelectMulti)
        Set can select multiple photos or not. If true then setIsCropped(boolean) option will be ignored.
        参数:
        canSelectMulti -

      • canSelectMultiVideo

        public MediaOptions.Builder canSelectMultiVideo(boolean canSelectMulti)
        Select multiple videos. If true, videos haven't check duration. It's override setMaxVideoDuration(int) and setMinVideoDuration(int)
        参数:
        canSelectMulti -

      • setMaxVideoDuration

        public MediaOptions.Builder setMaxVideoDuration(int maxDuration)
        Set max video's duration. If set, can't select multiple videos. It's override canSelectMultiVideo(boolean) option.
        参数:
        maxDuration - in milliseconds.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if maxDuration <=0
        另请参阅:
        setMinVideoDuration(int)

      • setMinVideoDuration

        public MediaOptions.Builder setMinVideoDuration(int minDuration)
        Set min video's duration. If set, can't select multi videos. It's override canSelectMultiVideo(boolean) option.
        参数:
        minDuration - in milliseconds.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if minDuration <=0
        另请参阅:
        setMaxVideoDuration(int)

      • canSelectBothPhotoVideo

        public MediaOptions.Builder canSelectBothPhotoVideo()
        Can choose photo or video. Default only choose photo.

      • selectVideo

        public MediaOptions.Builder selectVideo()
        Only choose video. This method override selectPhoto() if set before. Default only choose photo.

      • selectPhoto

        public MediaOptions.Builder selectPhoto()
        Only choose photo. This method override selectVideo() if set before.
        返回:

      • setPhotoCaptureFile

        public MediaOptions.Builder setPhotoCaptureFile(java.io.File file)
        参数:
        file - Use for save image that capture from camera. Default image saved in Environment.DIRECTORY_PICTURES folder of device, file create by MediaUtils.createDefaultImageFile()
        Note:
        - File should not exist when pass to this method. Because if use cancle capture photo, this file will be temporary.
        - In HTC devices (maybe others) this options not true, image isn't saved in this file, it's saved by folder default of camera.
        返回:

      • build

        public MediaOptions build()
        Build configured MediaOptions object.
        返回:
